SELECT NODE_ID ,NODE_NM ,NODE_ENM ,NODE_TYPE ,GPS_X ,GPS_Y ,USE_YN ,UPD_DTM ,UPD_ID FROM BMS_NODE_MST
AND (NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND (NODE_TYPE = 'NT001' OR NODE_TYPE = 'NT002')
AND NODE_TYPE = #{NODE_TYPE}
AND NODE_TYPE = #{NODE_TYPE}
GROUP BY NODE_ID ORDER BY NODE_ID
SELECT NODE_ID , NODE_NM FROM BMS_NODE_MST WHERE NODE_TYPE = 'NT002'

SELECT A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.DAY_DIV ,A.OPER_SN ,A.NODE_ID ,A.NODE_SN ,A.ALLOC_NO ,A.NODE_TYPE ,A.ARRV_TM ,A.DPRT_TM
,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') UPD_DTM ,A.UPD_ID ,B.REP_ROUT_NM ,C.ROUT_NM FROM BRT_OPER_ALLOC_PL_NODE_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST B ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = B.REP_ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST C ON A.ROUT_ID = C.ROUT_ID WHERE A.NODE_ID = #{NODE_ID} AND A.DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV} AND A.WAY_DIV = #{WAY_DIV} AND A.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002' ORDER BY A.OPER_SN, A.REP_ROUT_ID
